item.description:
Hello everyone,

One of our members, Tamami O'Neil, has been working with her company, US Japan Connect, and the Japanese Resource Exchange (JREX) in organizing a cultural networking event in Cambridge. The special guest for the event will be Masayuki Imai, the Director of "Winds of God" (the English translation of 'kamikaze'). He will cover various topics, including his reasons for making the film, and his philosophy towards generating global peace. There will also be music provided by artists from Living Sound Entertainment (LSE), an international entertainment company that specializes in music, video, and art production.

Please come for an exciting afternoon and a desire to make new friends!

Event Web Site:
http://www.jrex.us/...

Japanese Event Description:
http://web.mit.edu/~r...

English Event Description:
http://web.mit.edu/~r...
item.name: US-Japan Cultural and Networking Event - "Winds of Japan"
